items.question: What learning tracks are available?
items.answer:
We offer several main learning tracks:

• **QA (Quality Assurance)** - software testing
• **Business Analytics** - business process and requirements analysis
• **Frontend Development** - user interface creation
• **Backend Development** - server-side applications
• **Data Science** - data analysis and machine learning

Each track has its own program and expert instructors.

items.question: What are the admission requirements?
items.answer:
To enroll in our courses, you need:

• **Basic knowledge** of computers and the internet
• **Technical requirements**: stable internet connection, computer/laptop
• **Motivation** and readiness to learn
• **Age**: from 16 years old

Previous programming experience is not required for beginner courses.

items.question: How long does the training last?
items.answer:
Training duration depends on the chosen track:

• **Basic courses**: 2-3 months
• **Advanced courses**: 4-6 months
• **Complete cycle**: 8-12 months

Training takes place online with flexible scheduling options.

items.question: How to start learning?
items.answer:
To start learning, follow these steps:

1. **Choose a track** - review available courses
2. **Fill out the form** - provide your contact information
3. **Pay for the course** - choose a convenient payment method
4. **Get access** - we'll send login credentials
5. **Start learning** - follow the learning plan

Our managers will help at every stage.

items.question: How is the training organized?
items.answer:
Training is organized as conveniently as possible:

• **Online format** - learn from anywhere
• **Flexible schedule** - choose convenient times
• **Practical assignments** - reinforce knowledge on real projects
• **Mentor support** - get help when needed
• **Community** - communicate with other students

items.question: What support is provided?
items.answer:
We provide comprehensive support:

• **Technical support** - help with the platform
• **Learning support** - explanation of complex topics
• **Career consultation** - employment advice
• **24/7 chat** - quick answers to questions
• **Personal manager** - support throughout the course

items.question: How much does the training cost?
items.answer:
Training cost depends on the chosen course:

• **Basic course**: from $99
• **Advanced course**: from $199
• **Complete cycle**: from $299

Student discounts and group application discounts are available. Payment in installments is possible.

items.question: What payment methods are available?
items.answer:
We accept various payment methods:

• **Bank cards** (Visa, MasterCard)
• **E-wallets** (PayPal, Stripe)
• **Bank transfers**
• **Cryptocurrency** (Bitcoin, Ethereum)
• **Installments** through partner banks

All payments are secure and safe.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer:
Yes, we provide a money-back guarantee:

• **14 days** - full refund without questions
• **30 days** - refund with valid reasons
• **After 30 days** - considered individually

The refund process takes 3-5 business days.

items.question: Do you help with employment?
items.answer:
Yes, we provide comprehensive career support:

• **Resume** - help with creation
• **Portfolio** - preparation of projects for showcase
• **Interviews** - training interview skills
• **Vacancies** - access to exclusive offers
• **Networking** - meeting potential employers

Our graduates work in leading IT companies.

items.question: What salary can I expect after completing the course?
items.answer:
Salary depends on many factors:

• **Junior positions**: $800-1500 per month
• **Middle positions**: $1500-3000 per month
• **Senior positions**: $3000+ per month

Consider:
- Experience and skills
- City/country of work
- Specialization
- Market demand

items.question: Do you issue certificates?
items.answer:
Yes, after successfully completing the course, you receive:

• **Certificate** of course completion
• **Portfolio** with completed projects
• **Recommendation letter** from mentor
• **Access to graduate community**
• **Lifetime support** on career matters

The certificate is recognized by employers and HR specialists.
